titlebarHeight.name: The height of DTitleBar
titlebarHeight.description: Configure the height of the DTitleBar

themeType.name: The application theme type
themeType.description: The application theme type, which can be set to follow the system theme (0), light theme (1), dark theme (2)
themeType.description[zh_CN]: 应用主题的颜色，可以设置为跟随系统(0)、浅色(1)、 深色(2)，默认为跟随系统

featureUpdated.name: Whether the application has new feature updates
featureUpdated.description: Configure the update status of the application

autoDisplayFeature.name: The application automatically display new features once
autoDisplayFeature.name[zh_CN]: 配置应用是否自动展示一次新特性
autoDisplayFeature.description: The application automatically display updated contents once

underlineShortcut.name: Whether shortcuts are underlined.
underlineShortcut.name[zh_CN]: 快捷键是否显示下划线

keyboardsearchDisabled.name: Whether disable the typing to search for menu items
keyboardsearchDisabled.name[zh_CN]: 配置是否禁用菜单通过按键搜索菜单项
keyboardsearchDisabled.description: Configures whether disable the typing to search for menu items, which would otherwise require pressing Shift or Alt to trigger the menu item directly.

rules.name: The logging rules of dtk applications
rules.description: Configure the category and level of log output
rules.description[zh_CN]: 配置日志输出的类别和等级

enableDtkAnimations.name: Whether to enable dtk animation effects
enableDtkAnimations.name[zh_CN]: 是否启用 dtk 控件动画效果
enableDtkAnimations.description: Configure to enable/disable animation effects. Note that you need to restart the application to take effect.
enableDtkAnimations.description[zh_CN]: 配置启/禁用动画效果，注意需要重启应用生效配置。

scrollBarPolicy.name: Scroll bar strategy for controlling dtk applications
scrollBarPolicy.name[zh_CN]: 控制 dtk 应用的滚动条策略
scrollBarPolicy.description: Configure the scrollbar policy for the dtk application, with values following the behavior of Qt:: ScrollBarPolicy.
scrollBarPolicy.description[zh_CN]: 配置 dtk 应用的滚动条策略, 其值的行为遵循 Qt::ScrollBarPolicy

sizeMode.name: Compact mode switch for controlling dtk applications
sizeMode.name[zh_CN]: 控制 dtk 应用的紧凑模式开关
sizeMode.description: Configure whether to enable compact mode, 0 is disabled, 1 is enabled.
sizeMode.description[zh_CN]: 配置是否开启紧凑模式, 0为禁用, 1为启用
